posts.author: Beatrice Amstrong
posts.post: Suffering builds character. You might think this is saddistic, yes it is. Do I derive pleasure from this? I guess only mind readers will find out. Is this a passive agressive message? Not at all

posts.author: Nobody Else
posts.post: I am doing this once again, not tiring at all.

posts.author: Victor Me
posts.post: This is what we as humanity are headed for. Sometimes I wonder if my fees was a waste of money, if AI is going to kill us all eventually.

posts.postTitle: Is AI Taking This Job Soon
posts.author: All Of Us
posts.post: If I knew this at the beginning of this course I would have bought a cow, much better if I am to be replaced anyway.
